translations: 映像真空管；电视显像管；电视节目录像

sentences.sentence: The new kinescope has a revolving power of 800 lines.
sentences.translation: 新型显像管有旋转800线圈的功能。

sentences.sentence: Description of the profile of electron beam is one of the difficult points in detection of color kinescope.
sentences.translation: 电子束轮廓的描述是彩色显像管特性检测中的难点之一。

sentences.sentence: Electron gun accessories of color kinescope are made of stainless steel which has high hardness and intensity.
sentences.translation: 彩色显象管电子枪零件一般由不锈钢材料制成，具有较高的硬度和强度。
